Name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Halloween
About the game: Pixel Puzzles 2: Halloween is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, featuring 25 images in a spooky style, with each puzzle piece uniquely shaped in a way no physical puzzle could be. Features: 25 puzzles in a range of sizes from 60 to 350 pieces. Auto saving, never lose your progress. Spooky puzzling atmosphere. Traditional puzzle gameplay. 27 Steam Achievements. Puzzle piece rotation. Interactive play environment.
